languages.text: {n}Под вашими пальцами сведенное судорогой тело арбитра обмякает. Мрачно сведя брови, Соломон рокочет:{/n} "Не делиться — лучше. Когда говоришь с другими о том, что у тебя на сердце, то привязываешься к ним. А привязываться — скверная привычка для арбитра. На моей службе каждый человек, которого ты знаешь достаточно долго, чтобы проникнуться к нему чувствами, скорее всего умрет прежде времени и плохой смертью. Терять людей — больно. Ты будто умираешь по кусочку души с каждым из них".

{n}Under your fingers, the Arbitrator's tremoring body relaxes. With his eyebrows drawn together grimly, Solomorne murmurs,{/n} "Not sharing it is better. When you talk to someone about what's weighing on your soul, you become attached to them. And becoming attached is a bad habit for an Arbitrator. In my service, every person you know long enough to develop feelings for is likely to die before their time, and horribly, at that. Losing people hurts. It's like a piece of your soul dies with each of them."

Ты будто умираешь по кусочку души с каждым из них".

languages.text: {n}Au contact de votre main, le corps tremblant de l'arbitrator se détend. Fronçant les sourcils d'un air sombre, il murmure :{/n} « Je préfère garder ça pour moi. Confier à quelqu'un ce qui nous pèse sur la conscience crée des liens affectifs qui ne sont pas compatibles avec le devoir d'un arbitrator. Dans mon travail, tous ceux que l'on connaît assez longtemps pour s'attacher à eux ont de grandes chances de mourir prématurément et probablement dans des circonstances horribles. Il est douloureux de perdre les êtres qui nous sont chers. C'est comme si une partie de notre âme mourait avec chacun d'eux. »
languages.original_text: {n}Under your fingers, the Arbitrator's tremoring body relaxes. With his eyebrows drawn together grimly, Solomorne murmurs,{/n} "Not sharing it is better. When you talk to someone about what's weighing on your soul, you become attached to them. And becoming attached is a bad habit for an Arbitrator. In my service, every person you know long enough to develop feelings for is likely to die before their time, and horribly, at that. Losing people hurts. It's like a piece of your soul dies with each of them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Au contact de votre main, le corps tremblant de l'arbitrator se détend. Fronçant les sourcils d'un air sombre, il murmure :{/n} « Je préfère garder ça pour moi. Confier à quelqu'un ce qui nous pèse sur la conscience crée des liens affectifs qui ne sont pas compatibles avec le devoir d'un arbitrator. Dans mon travail, tous ceux que l'on connaît assez longtemps pour s'attacher à eux ont de grandes chances de mourir prématurément et probablement dans des circonstances horribles. Il est douloureux de perdre les êtres qui nous sont chers. C'est comme si une partie de notre âme mourait avec chacun d'eux. »

languages.text: {n}あなたの指先の下で震えていたアービトレイターの体から、次第に力が抜けていった。ソロモーンは眉を厳しくひそめながら、低くつぶやいた。{/n}「話さないほうがいいんです。魂にのしかかるものを誰かに話せば、その人に情が移ります。そして情を持つことは、アービトレイターにとってはよくないことなのです。私の任務では、感情を抱くほど長く関わった人間は、たいてい早すぎる死を迎えます。しかも、無残な最期を。誰かを失うことには痛みを伴います。魂の一部が、そのたびに一緒に死んでいくようなものです」
languages.original_text: {n}Under your fingers, the Arbitrator's tremoring body relaxes. With his eyebrows drawn together grimly, Solomorne murmurs,{/n} "Not sharing it is better. When you talk to someone about what's weighing on your soul, you become attached to them. And becoming attached is a bad habit for an Arbitrator. In my service, every person you know long enough to develop feelings for is likely to die before their time, and horribly, at that. Losing people hurts. It's like a piece of your soul dies with each of them."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの指先の下で震えていたアービトレイターの体から、次第に力が抜けていった。ソロモーンは眉を厳しくひそめながら、低くつぶやいた。{/n}「話さないほうがいいんです。魂にのしかかるものを誰かに話せば、その人に情が移ります。そして情を持つことは、アービトレイターにとってはよくないことなのです。私の任務では、感情を抱くほど長く関わった人間は、たいてい早すぎる死を迎えます。しかも、無残な最期を。誰かを失うことには痛みを伴います。魂の一部が、そのたびに一緒に死んでいくようなものです」

languages.text: {n}Bajo tus manos, el tembloroso cuerpo del Arbitrator empieza a relajarse. Frunciendo el ceño, Solomorne murmura con tono grave:{/n} «Es mejor no compartirlo. Cuando se habla con alguien de las cargas del alma de uno, eso produce apego. Y el apego es malo para un Arbitrator. En mis funciones, todas las personas a las que conozco el tiempo suficiente para desarrollar sentimientos tienen una gran probabilidad de morir de forma temprana y especialmente espantosa. Perder a la gente duele. Es como perder parte del alma con cada uno».
languages.original_text: {n}Under your fingers, the Arbitrator's tremoring body relaxes. With his eyebrows drawn together grimly, Solomorne murmurs,{/n} "Not sharing it is better. When you talk to someone about what's weighing on your soul, you become attached to them. And becoming attached is a bad habit for an Arbitrator. In my service, every person you know long enough to develop feelings for is likely to die before their time, and horribly, at that. Losing people hurts. It's like a piece of your soul dies with each of them."

Cuando se habla con alguien de las cargas del alma de uno, eso produce apego. Y el apego es malo para un Arbitrator. En mis funciones, todas las personas a las que conozco el tiempo suficiente para desarrollar sentimientos tienen una gran probabilidad de morir de forma temprana y especialmente espantosa. Perder a la gente duele. Es como perder parte del alma con cada uno».

languages.text: {n}在你手指的爱抚之下，索罗蒙颤抖的身体渐渐放松下来。他阴沉地皱着眉头，低声开了口。{/n}“还是不要分享这些为好，一旦你开始与别人谈论你灵魂深处的压力时，你就会开始依赖这个人。对法务官而言，依赖是个糟糕的习惯。在我的职业生涯中，每个你认识了很久，开始产生感情的那些人，最终都可能会不幸身亡，而且死得很惨。失去这些人的时候，你会非常痛苦，就仿佛当他们离世的时候，你灵魂的一部分也随着他们的死而消逝了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Under your fingers, the Arbitrator's tremoring body relaxes. With his eyebrows drawn together grimly, Solomorne murmurs,{/n} "Not sharing it is better. When you talk to someone about what's weighing on your soul, you become attached to them. And becoming attached is a bad habit for an Arbitrator. In my service, every person you know long enough to develop feelings for is likely to die before their time, and horribly, at that. Losing people hurts. It's like a piece of your soul dies with each of them."

traits.locale_text: {n}在你手指的爱抚之下，索罗蒙颤抖的身体渐渐放松下来。他阴沉地皱着眉头，低声开了口。{/n}“还是不要分享这些为好，一旦你开始与别人谈论你灵魂深处的压力时，你就会开始依赖这个人。对法务官而言，依赖是个糟糕的习惯。在我的职业生涯中，每个你认识了很久，开始产生感情的那些人，最终都可能会不幸身亡，而且死得很惨。失去这些人的时候，你会非常痛苦，就仿佛当他们离世的时候，你灵魂的一部分也随着他们的死而消逝了。”

languages.text: {n}Yargıcı'nın kaskatı kesilen bedeni, dokunuşunla birlikte gevşiyor. Kaşlarını kasvetli bir havayla çatan Solomorne mırıldanıyor.{/n} "Paylaşmasam daha iyi. Ruhuna ağır gelen yükleri paylaştığın insana bağlanırsın. Bağlanmak, biz Yargıcılar için iyi değildir. Duygu besleyecek kadar uzun süre tanıdığımız herkes vaktinden önce, feci şekilde can vermeye meyillidir. Sevdiğini kaybetmek insanı kırar. Her bir yitirdiğinle ruhunun bir parçası da ölür âdeta."
languages.original_text: {n}Under your fingers, the Arbitrator's tremoring body relaxes. With his eyebrows drawn together grimly, Solomorne murmurs,{/n} "Not sharing it is better. When you talk to someone about what's weighing on your soul, you become attached to them. And becoming attached is a bad habit for an Arbitrator. In my service, every person you know long enough to develop feelings for is likely to die before their time, and horribly, at that. Losing people hurts. It's like a piece of your soul dies with each of them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Dokunuşunla birlikte Yargıcı'nın kaskatı kesilen bedeni gevşiyor. Kaşlarını kasvetli bir havayla çatan Solomorne mırıldanıyor.{/n} "Paylaşmasam daha iyi. Ruhuna ağır gelen yükleri paylaştığın insana bağlanırsın. Bağlanmak, biz Yargıcılar için iyi değildir. Duygu besleyecek kadar uzun süre tanıdığımız herkes vaktinden önce, feci şekilde can vermeye meyillidir genelde. Sevdiğini kaybetmek insanı kırar. Her bir yitirdiğinle ruhunun bir parçası da ölür âdeta."

languages.text: {n}Als er deine Berührung spürt, entspannt sich der bebende Leib des Arbitrators ein wenig. Solomorne legt grimmig die Stirn in Falten und murmelt: {/n} "Es ist besser, genau das nicht zu tun. Erzählt man jemandem von der Last der eigenen Seele, verliebt man sich in ihn. Und für einen Arbitrator schickt es sich nicht, sich zu verlieben. In meinem Beruf stirbt jede Person, die man lange genug kennt, um Gefühle für sie zu entwickeln, für gewöhnlich einen grausamen Tod. Es tut weh, jemanden zu verlieren. Es ist, als würde mit jedem von ihnen ein Teil Eurer Seele sterben."
languages.original_text: {n}Under your fingers, the Arbitrator's tremoring body relaxes. With his eyebrows drawn together grimly, Solomorne murmurs,{/n} "Not sharing it is better. When you talk to someone about what's weighing on your soul, you become attached to them. And becoming attached is a bad habit for an Arbitrator. In my service, every person you know long enough to develop feelings for is likely to die before their time, and horribly, at that. Losing people hurts. It's like a piece of your soul dies with each of them."

Solomorne legt grimmig die Stirn in Falten und murmelt: {/n} "Es ist besser, genau das nicht zu tun. Erzählt man jemandem von der Last der eigenen Seele, verliebt man sich in ihn. Und für einen Arbitrator schickt es sich nicht, sich zu verlieben. In meinem Beruf stirbt jede Person, die man lange genug kennt, um Gefühle für sie zu entwickeln, für gewöhnlich einen grausamen Tod. Es tut weh, jemanden zu verlieren. Es ist, als würde mit jedem von ihnen ein Teil Eurer Seele sterben."
